name: The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault
description:
Introducing the first game released by Golden Ox featuring an evolving world from the newly realised novel; The Chronicles: Wasteland. Join a growing community and discover an epic saga featuring Lordus and his fellow comrades as they fight off and survive against a growing hoard of Screamers.

The Chronicles: Wasteland Assault is a growing and ever expanding game. That will guarantee constant free updates to players.

As of V1.0 TC:WA is still in development with more work being added. The first several updates will reset progress as we are making sure that we cater to new players in the beginning. Expect weekly, fortnightly and monthly updates where new content will be delivered such as: new characters added, more quests and missions to be completed, new gameplay mechanics and map expansions.

PLAY... LEVEL UP... BECOME STRONGER


Unlock characters from the novel and expand their skill set by slaughtering merciless Screamers, completing unique missions and rescuing survivors trapped and cornered in the deadlands. Complete character specific quests to unlock your hero’s fullest potential!

COLLECT... UPGRADE... DOMINATE


From basic ballistic firearms to nitrogen spitting canisters, find, purchase and create many different kinds of weaponry to assist your heroes and make your survival a tad easier. Need an AR to fire faster, step right up to the blacksmith. Need your rocket launcher to hold more rockets to unleash flurry explosions of death, find the blueprint hidden in the ruined city of Dubai. With more weapons in the works for you to experiment and play with, you'll have a hard time deciding what to take with you and what to leave behind.

FORGE... COMBINE... RANK UP

Turn your game play experience into a unique adventure by collecting and fusing equipment cards that will allow you to modify your characters and give them deadly, interesting and good 'ol fashion fun fuelled mayhem. From common rarity all the way to fabled, finding these relics will unleash your fullest potential, with many more planned to drop that will really turn the tides of combat to your favour!



Fight on and survive. Forge the safezone into a habitable bastion and save those who are lost within the dreadful hold of the dealands.
